subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han compound|火|商|c1=s|c2=p|t1=fire|t2=quotient|ls=psc}}

Coined by Chinese physical scientist Hu Gangfu ({{l|zh|w:zh:胡剛復|胡剛復}}) in 1923 to translate the concept of [[entropy]] in thermodynamics, where {{m|zh|商||[[quotient]]}} represents the quotient of [[heat]] and [[temperature]], and {{m|zh|火||fire}} represents its relation to [[thermodynamics]].
